params.willCommitment: Commitment hash of the will (off-chain/Noir generated)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkIn().notice: Owner pings the contract to prove activity

finalizeInactivity(bytes32).notice: Finalize inactivity and emit signal for Aztec executor

gracePeriod().notice: Grace buffer (in seconds) after inactivity is detected

graceStart().notice: Timestamp when grace period started (0 if not started)

hasVetoed(address).notice: Track which veto members have already vetoed

inactiveFinalized().notice: Whether inactivity has been finalized (execution signal emitted)

inactivityPeriod().notice: Number of seconds until the owner is considered inactive

isVetoMember(address).notice: Mapping of addresses allowed to veto execution

lastCheckIn().notice: Last timestamp when owner checked in

triggerGracePeriod().notice: Trigger grace period if owner has been inactive long enough

veto().notice: Cast a veto during the grace period

vetoCount().notice: Number of vetoes actually cast in current grace period

vetoThreshold().notice: Minimum number of vetoes required to block execution
